title: Early Surrender trolls
body: People are queuing up in 4 man's and just afk surrendering in 3 minutes to intentionally annoy the other 6 people. This new surrender is not helping anyone and just giving the immature players another way to trol. Pls riot remove this bs

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you encounter players abusing the system like this, please report them in the post-game lobby.

If you forget to do so, or wish to submit any further details that you missed in your initial report please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the information to the appropriate teams.
